channel.title: Client handler problem when i run server
channel.description:
ok when i run my server... this is what it say's
LKC The Return Is Now ONLINE! ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:4777 Help please [br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2007, 03:00:40 PM[/size][hr]but instead of it saying accepted from localhost once it say's that until my server crashes.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2007, 03:20:28 PM[/size][hr]help
